about_the_game:
In this immersive and tactical Medieval SRPG, play as a Child born as a Reaper as they are being hunted by the Empire. Every choice impacts the story, and who you are, and how others view you. 12 different unique job classes to choose from with many different outcomes. Find your destiny.

12 different jobs to choose from, all with unique mechanics:

  •  Warrior: Known to never flee a battle with strong combat abilities in close quarters.

  •  Barbarian: Ruthless and feared among all men. Can easily intimidate and recruit allies from fear alone.

  •  Galloglass: A greedy mercenary known to get paid a little extra to do anything asked.

  •  Village Elder: Being the leader of a Village takes a lot of work to make everyone satisfied, but is known to have great commanding power.

  •  Priest: A holy man who serves the Gods. Choose what God you devote yourself to and heal on the battlefield.

  •  Thief: A criminal despised by many, and cannot buy from normal stores. But they can steal and sell from underground markets.

  •  Beggar: Hated by most, seen as cowards. I can barely get enough to eat bread.

  •  Apostate: A faithless man, shunned by most villages and society. 

  •  Pecthach: A sinner branded with a disfigured body, has unnatural gifts.

  •  Taoiseach: A man who has gone up the ranks of the Goblin army to become one.

  •  Merchant: A man who knows how to buy and sell from anybody, can easily bribe their way out of bad situations. 

  •  Noble: A man of the Empire, strength are rather with their lips than their blade.

Each path has some unique content to them. Talk your way out of encounters, fight to the death, or bribe your way to victory. Become a faithless thief, a holy mercenary, a coward merchant, or a charismatic priest. The choice is yours. What will your destiny behold?
